title: Fucking Flex
body: I'm facing fucking plats in my damn bronze 1 promotionals to silver....... what the actual fuck{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Be careful which ranks you're talking about when discussing flex. A lot of time things can be misleading where it's a bunch of bronze/silver flex players playing against each other so it's 'fair' as far as matchmaking concerned, it's just some of them have good solo/duo queue ranks as well. In some cases, it's because while they're individually talented they have very little ability to work as a team, so they legitimately belong in that lower flex rank. In many other cases, it's just because flex is still new and people haven't been playing it enough, so people haven't had a chance to all earn their 'true' flex MMRs yet.
